lyric.verse: Waraoo ka? Waratte miseyoo ka? Kagami ni wa Okizari no kodomo Kawai soo ni MAMA wa modoranai no ne Ame wa hutte Yamukoto mo shirazu ni
lyric.chorus: Tada hitori no na wo saken demo Ueta shitone wa suna ni mamire Kokoro wa unadareru bundake Kakimidasu yoo ni atemonaku
lyric.verse: Kareoo ka? Waratte kaeroo ka? Sayonara wa mekakushi demo dekiru Kamisami ga Toko ni huserareru koro Ame wa tsutzu ite Taiyoo sae ochita
lyric.chorus: Anata ja nai dareka ni sae mo Kakaekirenai netsu wo azuketa Itsushika mitasareru bundake Kawaita sukima wo kanjiteta Tada hitori no na wo saken demo Ueta shitone wa suna ni mamire Kokoro wa unadareru bundake Kakimidasu yoo ni atemonaku
lyric.verse: Waraoo ka? Waratte miseyoo ka? Kagami ni wa Okizari no kodomo Kawai soo ni MAMA wa modoranai no ne Ame wa hutte Yamukoto mo shirazu ni

translator.translatorname: Mika Arita, Kazu 'Omi' Kajihara, Marcelluss D. Nealy

lyric.verse: Shall I smile? Shall I show you a smile? A little child left alone in the mirror How poor ... Your mother won't come back The rain keeps falling without knowing there's an end
lyric.chorus: Even if I shout out one's name The empty bed is buried in the sand This heart only hangs down Scratching without knowing where to go
lyric.verse: Shall I go home? Shall I go home with a big smile? It's too easy to say goodbye Even with eyes blindfolded When God falls asleep The rain kept falling and Even the sun fell down
lyric.chorus: I left all my overflowing fever Even in somebody else's care, not you The more I fell up, the more I fall into the dry distance Even if I shout out one's name The empty bed is buried in the sand This heart only hangs down Scratching without knowing where to go
lyric.verse: Shall I smile? Shall I show you a smile? A little child left alone in the mirror How poor ... Your mother won't come back The rain keeps falling without knowing there's an end
